content: fall into the heart of pumpkin season with this enchanting pumpkin patch twist headband crochet pattern adorned with irresistible 3d puffy pumpkins in cheerful orange complete with tiny green stems this headband wraps your style in cozy autumn magic the clever twisted front adds a modern touch to the classic design making it a standout accessory for harvest festivals casual outings or gifting this pattern stitches up iso quickly with simple stitches and clever color work providing an interesting texture three sizes provided toddler child & adult so you can make mommy & me matching sets for all of your fall adventures
